title: Olympic National Park: Distance Learning
body: Distance Learning                    The Science of Elwha Immerses students into the Elwha River Restoration using web-based...           Results   Showing results 1-1 of 1    Sort By:  Title Date         Olympic National Park The Science of Elwha    Using web-based video conferencing software to connect classrooms and students with an Olympic Park Ranger, the “Science of Elwha” program introduces the scientific method by investigating real life scientific research and monitoring projects centered on the Elwha’s anadromous fish populations.     1 2 3 4 5  Good Average: 4.0 (181 ratings)   Type:Distance Learning Grade level:Sixth Grade-Eighth Grade Subjects:Aquatic Studies, Biodiversity, Biology: Animals, Community, Ecological Engineering, Ecology, Environment, Government, Hydrology, Physical Science, Planning/Development, Wildlife Management
